entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
